targets.rawSql: SELECT max(v.as_of_day) as as_of_day, map_name, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, identity_id, argMax(x_raw, v.as_of_day) as x_raw, argMax(y_raw, v.as_of_day) as y_raw, argMax(x_norm, v.as_of_day) as x_norm, argMax(y_norm, v.as_of_day) as y_norm FROM stats.v_ic_landscape_points AS v WHERE map_name = 'churn_throughput' AND v.as_of_day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND v.as_of_day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') GROUP BY map_name, team_id, identity_id ORDER BY team_id, identity_id

SELECT max(v.as_of_day) as as_of_day, map_name, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, identity_id, argMax(x_raw, v.as_of_day) as x_raw, argMax(y_raw, v.as_of_day) as y_raw, argMax(x_norm, v.as_of_day) as x_norm, argMax(y_norm, v.as_of_day) as y_norm FROM stats.v_ic_landscape_points AS v WHERE map_name = 'cycle_throughput' AND v.as_of_day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND v.as_of_day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') GROUP BY map_name, team_id, identity_id ORDER BY team_id, identity_id

SELECT max(v.as_of_day) as as_of_day, map_name, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, identity_id, argMax(x_raw, v.as_of_day) as x_raw, argMax(y_raw, v.as_of_day) as y_raw, argMax(x_norm, v.as_of_day) as x_norm, argMax(y_norm, v.as_of_day) as y_norm FROM stats.v_ic_landscape_points AS v WHERE map_name = 'wip_throughput' AND v.as_of_day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND v.as_of_day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') GROUP BY map_name, team_id, identity_id ORDER BY team_id, identity_id

list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT id AS __value, name AS __text FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'unassigned' AS __value, 'Unassigned' AS __text ORDER BY __text
